content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a court case in estonia the case involves two parties referred to as x and the defendant the harju county court made a decision in favor of x awarding them 284509 euros but this amount was reduced by 48471 euros the court also dismissed a counterclaim by the defendant and ordered them to pay 48471 euros to x the county courts decision was partially upheld allowing xs claim for 82791 euros to proceed both parties have the right to appeal the decision to the supreme court within 30 days the case involves a dispute over inheritance and funeral expenses the district court annulled part of the county courts decision and made a new decision regarding the distribution of costs the appeal stage is ongoing with the parties still arguing over various claims and counterclaims the court violated procedural norms in identifying the facts and reached an incorrect conclusion the court also considered the defendants access to the deceased persons bank account as unjust enrichment the panel changes the grounds of the courts decision and refers to the law of succession act the court also discusses the expenses determined by the county court and the violation of procedural rules the court calculates funeral expenses based on various factors and allowances the court also addresses apartmentrelated expenses and deducts a certain amount the defendant filed a counterclaim which was dismissed by the county court the defendant appealed but the district court disagreed the court determined that the defendant was entitled to reimbursement of costs related to the lawsuit but the distribution of procedural costs should be changed the court decided that the procedural costs should be borne by both parties the distribution of procedural costs was contested and the courts decision on the distribution of procedural costs was determined
